title: security bootcamp
extract: Cybersecurity Bootcamps: High-Intensity Training for a Career in IT Security. ... Bootcamps in the world of information technology aren't quite as brutal and physical as their military namesakes, but they do specialize in throwing a lot of new information at a lot of people in a short period of time.
extract_html: Cybersecurity Bootcamps: High-Intensity Training for a Career in IT Security. ... Bootcamps in the world of information technology aren't quite as brutal and physical as their military namesakes, but they do specialize in throwing a lot of new information at a lot of people in a short period of time.
